bug.short_desc: VirtualSelectBox type-to-select feature inconsistent with SelectBox

long_desc.thetext:
See the demos:
SelectBox http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/#widget~SelectBox.html
VirtualSelectBox http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/#virtual~SelectBox.html
Steps to reproduce: 1) I go to the VirtualSelectBox demo site 2) I click on the "With Icons" VirtualSelectBox, opening the dropdown 3) I type on my keyboard "printer"
What I expect to happen: 1) The moment I press the "p" key, the "pda" option is selected 2) The moment I press the "r" key, the "printer" option is selected
What happens instead: 1) Nothing happens for 1 second, and then "printer" is selected
What should be done: VirtualSelectBox should be made to respond immediately to feedback instead of having a delay in order to make it consistent as a drop-in replacement for SelectBox.
I understand that the delay may have been added because of performance issues with looking through large models, however, I believe supporting both modes for those worried about performance would be the best course of action. My issue is UX and users not knowing the feature exists because of the delay.
